subject: Self Care
title: What Melatonin Actually Does
description: One-minute skill: What Melatonin Actually Does.

hook.text: Melatonin supplements are everywhere now. Most people misunderstand what the hormone actually does.

buildup.text: Melatonin doesn't cause sleep. It signals darkness to the body ‚Äî a timing cue, not a sedative.

discovery.text: Low-dose melatonin can help with jet lag or shifting sleep schedules but not chronic insomnia.

twist.text: Most supplements contain far more melatonin than the body produces, often with inconsistent dosing.

climax.text: Natural melatonin works best. Dim lights, avoid screens, and your body produces exactly what it needs.

punchline.text: Melatonin is a timer, not a sleeping pill.
